endpoints.name: Track Profile View
endpoints.description: Track when someone views a supplier profile

endpoints.name: Track Search
endpoints.description: Track when someone searches on the platform

notes: These endpoints are PUBLIC - no authentication required
Track view should be called when someone visits a supplier profile page
Track search should be called when someone performs a search on the platform
Data from these endpoints populates the analytics dashboard
customer_type helps in customer demographics analysis
location data helps in geographic insights
